sources.title: Puddy's Coronation (1937)
sources.description: Puddy and Kiko watch a king's coronation parade on a large Television receiver. They fight and Puddy's knocked out, and dreams he's now a despotic monarch that puts Kiko into a torture chamber. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/puddys-coronation-1937/

metadata.Plot: Puddy and Kiko watch a king's coronation parade on a large Television receiver. They fight and Puddy's knocked out, and dreams he's now a despotic monarch that puts Kiko into a torture chamber.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Barbera, Dan Gordon, Paul Terry
metadata.Actors: Kiko The Kangaroo, Puddy The Pup
